author: Hannah Al-Othman, Ikran Dahir
title: Coronavirus Is Hitting The UK's Black And Asian Communities Across The UK. Here's How.
description: BuzzFeed News spoke to doctors, epidemiologists, charities, and community leaders as the government launched a review into why BAME people are being disproportionately affected. View Entire Post ›
content:
